Featured Course

Taylor Swift Guitar Course ðŸŽ¸

Learn to play your favorite Taylor Swift songs on guitar! This course is designed for Swifties of all skill levels who want to strum along to every era.

What You'll Learn

This course covers Taylor's biggest hits across all eras â€” from the country beginnings to the indie folk of Folklore and Evermore. You'll learn essential chords, strumming patterns, capo positions, and how to sing while you play. Each song is broken down step-by-step so you can follow along at your own pace.

Who It's For

Beginners who know basic chords (G, C, D, Em) or want to learn them. No prior experience needed â€” just a guitar and a love of Taylor's music. All ages welcome!

How It Works

The course is available as part of your regular private lessons. Let me know you're interested when you sign up, and we'll build your lessons around Taylor's catalog! We can also do a focused 4-week deep dive into a specific era.

Brooke's Lessons

Private online guitar, voice, and ukulele lessons for all ages. Based in the DFW metroplex, teaching students everywhere online.
